name: df-mat2pmat
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cmat2pmat, cmpo(s0, s1, cfn, universe, cmpt(s2, cfv(cbs, co(cv(s0), cmat, cv(s1))), cmpo(s3, s4, cv(s0), cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cascl, cfv(cpl1, cv(s1))), co(cv(s3), cv(s2), cv(s4)))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ matToPolyMat =(s0 ‚àà Fin, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà(Base `(s0[Mat]s1))‚Ü¶(s3 ‚àà s0, s4 ‚àà s0 ‚Ü¶((algSc `(Poly1 ` s1))`(s3[s2]s4)))))
comment: Transformation of a matrix (over a ring) into a matrix over the corresponding polynomial ring. (Contributed by AV, 31-Jul-2019.)
